title: leaver buster
body: hi Riot leaver buster is not working well i dodged before the game start 2 times it should be 10 or 15 min but it gave me 30 min ban can i have some information about how it works please ?????

replies.body: It sounds like this wasn't your first time dodging a game or getting a leaverbuster for it, which is why the timer went up. [**Multiple leaverbusters in a rather short amount of time**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714#h2q2) will extend the amount of time you have to wait.
ok i understand now thank you so much
